doctor.name: Dr. Paritosh Kumar Ghosh
doctor.specialty: Mental Diseases, Drug Addiction & Psychiatry Specialist
doctor.workplace: Shaheed Ziaur Rahman Medical College & Hospital
doctor.info: Dr. Paritosh Kumar Ghosh is a Mental Diseases Specialist in Bogra. His qualification is MBBS, MCPS, DPM (Psychiatry). He is a Former Assistant Professor & Head, Psychiatry at Shaheed Ziaur Rahman Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Shamsun Nahar Clinic, Bogura. Practicing hour of Dr. Paritosh Kumar Ghosh at Shamsun Nahar Clinic, Bogura is 3pm to 8pm (Closed: Friday).
